redcap:Alerts.email_subject: Notification - Start of Phase 1 (Baseline control phase) for [record-dag-label]
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Hello,

This is an automated email notifying site [record-dag-label] that the scheduled date for Phase 1 - Baseline control phase (2 months) has been reached. 

During this phase, in order to collect accurate data on current care and temperature monitoring at the time of birth, hospitals will be asked to record data on all eligible infants; this is before any intervention or EENC training take place.

If this is inaccurate, please be sure to update the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:site_phase_dates_addtl_info] form on the REDCap database with the correct date. If the date is updated, this alert will retrigger on the updated start date.

Kind regards,

NEWS-HEAT

Email addresses can be added to, removed from, or updated on the mailing list for this site by updating the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:notification_email_addresses] form.

redcap:Alerts.email_subject: Notification - Start of Phase 2 (Training on EENC) for [record-dag-label]
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Hello,

This is an automated email notifying site [record-dag-label] that the scheduled date for Phase 2 - Training on EENC for all sites (1 month) has been reached.

During this phase, the aim is to ensure all participating hospitals are trained in the same aspects of newborn care at the time of birth, prior to any further intervention being introduced.

If this is inaccurate, please be sure to update the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:site_phase_dates_addtl_info] form on the REDCap database with the correct date. If the date is updated, this alert will retrigger on the updated start date.

Kind regards,

NEWS-HEAT

Email addresses can be added to, removed from, or updated on the mailing list for this site by updating the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:notification_email_addresses] form.

redcap:Alerts.email_subject: Notification - Start of Phase 3a (Randomisation and NEWS-HEAT training phase) for [record-dag-label]
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Hello,

This is an automated email notifying site [record-dag-label] that the scheduled date for Phase 3a - Randomisation and NEWS-HEAT training phase (2 months) has been reached. 

This phase will include time for training of intervention sites and cascade of training to all staff.

If this is inaccurate, please be sure to update the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:site_phase_dates_addtl_info] form on the REDCap database with the correct date. If the date is updated, this alert will retrigger on the updated start date.

Kind regards,

NEWS-HEAT

Email addresses can be added to, removed from, or updated on the mailing list for this site by updating the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:notification_email_addresses] form.

redcap:Alerts.email_subject: Notification - Start of Phase 3b (EENC implementation phase) for [record-dag-label]
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Hello,

This is an automated email notifying site [record-dag-label] that the scheduled date for Phase 3b - NEWS-HEAT and comparator implementation phase (3 months) has been reached. 

As this site has been randomised to EENC-only, this phase will include the implementation of EENC at this site.

If this is inaccurate, please be sure to update the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:site_phase_dates_addtl_info] form on the REDCap database with the correct date. If the date is updated, this alert will retrigger on the updated start date.

Kind regards,

NEWS-HEAT

Email addresses can be added to, removed from, or updated on the mailing list for this site by updating the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:notification_email_addresses] form.

Hello,

This is an automated email notifying site [record-dag-label] that their site has been randomised successfully.

Randomisation date/time: [site_rand_datetime]

Randomisation group: [site_rand_grp]

Kind regards,

NEWS-HEAT

Email addresses can be added to, removed from, or updated on the mailing list for this site by updating the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:notification_email_addresses] form.

redcap:Alerts.alert_title: Phase 3b Start (EENC plus NEWS-HEAT care bundle)
redcap:Alerts.email_subject: Notification - Start of Phase 3b (EENC plus NEWS-HEAT care bundle implementation phase) for [record-dag-label]
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Hello,

This is an automated email notifying site [record-dag-label] that the scheduled date for Phase 3b - NEWS-HEAT and comparator implementation phase (3 months) has been reached. 

As this site has been randomised to EENC plus NEWS-HEAT care bundle, this phase will include the implementation of EENC plus the NEWS-HEAT care bundle at this site.

If this is inaccurate, please be sure to update the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:site_phase_dates_addtl_info] form on the REDCap database with the correct date. If the date is updated, this alert will retrigger on the updated start date.

Kind regards,

NEWS-HEAT

Email addresses can be added to, removed from, or updated on the mailing list for this site by updating the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:notification_email_addresses] form.

redcap:Alerts.email_subject: Notification - Start of Phase 3b (NEWS-HEAT and comparator implementation phase) for [record-dag-label]
redcap:Alerts.alert_message:
Hello,

This is an automated email notifying site [record-dag-label] that the scheduled date for Phase 3b - NEWS-HEAT and comparator implementation phase (3 months) has been reached. 

This phase will include the implementation of EENC plus the NEWS-HEAT care bundle in half of the participating facilities, with the other half of facilities implementing EENC only.

If this is inaccurate, please be sure to update the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:site_phase_dates_addtl_info] form on the REDCap database with the correct date. If the date is updated, this alert will retrigger on the updated start date.

Kind regards,

NEWS-HEAT

Email addresses can be added to, removed from, or updated on the mailing list for this site by updating the [site_details_arm_3][form-link:notification_email_addresses] form.

redcap:ProjectDashboards.title: Reference Number Guidance
redcap:ProjectDashboards.body:
Arm 1: Trial Data

Structure (hover over each component for a description): 

##

Reference Number Description
 01-0001 Site 01's 1st participant
 01-0010 Site 01's 10th participant
 01-0100 Site 01's 100th participant
 01-1000 Site 01's 1000th participant

 

Arm 2: Screening Logs

Structure (hover over each component for a description): 

SL-
##

Mon
####

Valid Reference Number Examples:

Reference Number Description
 SL-01-Jan2026 Site 01's January 2026 screening log
 SL-02-Dec2027 Site 02's December 2027 screening log

 

Arm 3: Sites

Note: Site entries will be added by NCTU users (administrator, data management or trial management), but naming guidance is included below for guidance completeness.

redcap:ProjectDashboards.title: To-Do List
redcap:ProjectDashboards.body:
• Adding to this when I think of things I need to do or check over.

    • Logic for Admin only NCTU form and inv signoff form to open if at least 1 eligible baby enrolled in database
    • Advanced report logic
    • API calls to update dag suffix with current phase of site from site information form
      • Will also want to do a wiki section on how this works 
    • Calculated field on enrolment form for extracting current phase from dag name

Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
[arm3_site_shortlabel] - Notification Email Addresses

This form can be utilized to define email addresses to include on notification emails that alert sites to update their REDCap Mobile App configuration in the event of, for instance:

  • The implementation phase start date of a site has been changed
  • The redcap project has been updated

You can define up to 10 email addresses to include. Please do utilize the description field to give details on who each email address belongs to for clarity. You can also toggle email addresses on or off temporarily, if desired.

Question.TranslatedText: Form Version

Site Notification Email This form can be utilized to send emails to selected site(s). The email addresses that the email is sent to are pulled directly from each site's "Notification Email Addresses" form. Using the fields below, specify the subject and content of your email. You can also add attachment(s). Once done, save this form as complete and use the button that appears at the bottom of the page to trigger sending the email. Once the email has been sent at least once, the subject and content fields will no longer be editable, but you can resend the email by clicking the "Send Email" button at the bottom of the page again.
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
Site Notification Email

This form can be utilized to send emails to selected site(s). The email addresses that the email is sent to are pulled directly from each site's "Notification Email Addresses" form.

Using the fields below, specify the subject and content of your email. You can also add attachment(s). Once done, save this form as complete and use the button that appears at the bottom of the page to trigger sending the email.

Once the email has been sent at least once, the subject and content fields will no longer be editable, but you can resend the email by clicking the "Send Email" button at the bottom of the page again.

Question.TranslatedText: IMPORTANTIt appears that either the senders' email (e.g. who is viewing this form now) or some of the email addresses for the selected site(s) have been updated since this email was last sent on [nemail_sent_date]. Please click save and stay to save the updated email(s) to the database before resending the email if you're intending to resend it.
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
IMPORTANT

It appears that either the senders' email (e.g. who is viewing this form now) or some of the email addresses for the selected site(s) have been updated since this email was last sent on [nemail_sent_date]. Please click save and stay to save the updated email(s) to the database before resending the email if you're intending to resend it.

Question.TranslatedText: IMPORTANTIt appears that some of the email addresses for sites have been updated since this email was last sent on [nemail_sent_date] and, as a result, no emails are defined on the list (this may happen if, for instance, you send an email to site 01 that has one email defined on the list, then remove it, and then return here to try and email that site again). If you are looking to resend this email, please make sure the email list for the site(s) intended to be emailed are up to date, and then click save and stay to save the updated email address list for these sites. Then, so long as some emails are defined for the selected site(s), you will be able to resend the email. Doing so without following these steps may result in an error.
Question.redcap:FormattedTranslatedText:
IMPORTANT

It appears that some of the email addresses for sites have been updated since this email was last sent on [nemail_sent_date] and, as a result, no emails are defined on the list (this may happen if, for instance, you send an email to site 01 that has one email defined on the list, then remove it, and then return here to try and email that site again). If you are looking to resend this email, please make sure the email list for the site(s) intended to be emailed are up to date, and then click save and stay to save the updated email address list for these sites. Then, so long as some emails are defined for the selected site(s), you will be able to resend the email. Doing so without following these steps may result in an error.
